data.title: NBA Playoff Push: Seeding comes down to final day
data.meta_description: The NBA playoffs are right around the corner and that usually means it's time to start breaking down matchups and figuring out every squad's path to a championship. However, that can't happen with a majority of teams still not locked in for post-season contention.
